remarks: Independence of 2 vectors is preserved by vector sum.  (Contributed by NM, 26-Apr-2015.)
statement:
lspindp3.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lspindp3.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` W ) $.
lspindp3.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
lspindp3.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
lspindp3.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) $.
lspindp3.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
lspindp3.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. ( V \ { .0. } ) ) $.
lspindp3.e $e |- ( ph -> ( N ` { X } ) =/= ( N ` { Y } ) ) $.
lspindp3 $p |- ( ph -> ( N ` { X } ) =/= ( N ` { ( X .+ Y ) } ) ) $.
